project.name: User Authentication
project.description:
## Overview
Implement email/password authentication with session management.

## PRD Reference
[User Authentication PRD](https://notion.so/vibranium-labs/User-Auth-abc123)

## Technical Decisions
- JWT tokens for stateless auth (scales horizontally)
- bcrypt for password hashing (industry standard)
- 30-day refresh tokens (balance security/UX)

stories.title: User signup with email/password
stories.description:
## User Story
As a new user, I want to create an account with my email and password, so that I can access personalized features.

## Acceptance Criteria
1. **Given** I am on the signup page
   **When** I enter valid email and password
   **Then** my account is created and I am logged in

2. **Given** I try to signup
   **When** email already exists
   **Then** I see 'Email already registered' error

3. **Given** I try to signup
   **When** password is less than 8 characters
   **Then** I see validation error before submit

## Technical Notes
- **Approach:** Create User model, signup endpoint, password validation
- **Reasoning:** Standard email/password first, social auth later
- **Dependencies:** Database schema must exist

## Traceability
- PRD: FR-001

stories.title: Write tests for user signup
stories.description:
## User Story
As a developer, I want tests for signup, so that we catch regressions.

## Acceptance Criteria
1. **Given** valid signup data
   **When** signup endpoint called
   **Then** user created, 201 returned

2. **Given** duplicate email
   **When** signup attempted
   **Then** 409 conflict returned

3. **Given** weak password
   **When** signup attempted
   **Then** 400 with validation errors

## Technical Notes
- **Test type:** Integration tests for API
- **Fixtures:** Test database with seeded data
- **Mocks:** None (per project rules)

## Traceability
- PRD: FR-001
- Implements: User signup story

stories.title: User login with credentials
stories.description:
## User Story
As a returning user, I want to log in with my email and password, so that I can access my account.

## Acceptance Criteria
1. **Given** I have an account
   **When** I enter correct credentials
   **Then** I am logged in and redirected to dashboard

2. **Given** I enter wrong password
   **When** I submit login
   **Then** I see 'Invalid credentials' (no password leak)

3. **Given** I am logged in
   **When** I close and reopen browser
   **Then** I remain logged in (session persistence)

## Technical Notes
- **Approach:** JWT access + refresh token pattern
- **Reasoning:** Stateless, scalable, standard
- **Dependencies:** Signup must work first

## Traceability
- PRD: FR-002

stories.title: Session persistence across refreshes
stories.description:
## User Story
As a logged in user, I want my session to persist, so that I don't have to log in repeatedly.

## Acceptance Criteria
1. **Given** I am logged in
   **When** I refresh the page
   **Then** I remain logged in

2. **Given** my access token expires
   **When** I make a request
   **Then** token refreshes automatically

3. **Given** 30 days have passed
   **When** I return to the site
   **Then** I must log in again

## Technical Notes
- **Approach:** Refresh token in httpOnly cookie
- **Reasoning:** Secure, prevents XSS token theft
- **Dependencies:** Login must work

## Traceability
- PRD: FR-004

stories.title: Clear error messages for auth failures
stories.description:
## User Story
As a user who made a mistake, I want clear error messages, so that I can fix the problem.

## Acceptance Criteria
1. **Given** I enter invalid email format
   **When** I try to submit
   **Then** I see 'Please enter a valid email'

2. **Given** I enter wrong password
   **When** login fails
   **Then** I see 'Invalid email or password' (no password hints)

## Technical Notes
- **Approach:** Client-side validation + API error mapping
- **Reasoning:** Good UX without security leaks
- **Dependencies:** Can be done in parallel

## Traceability
- PRD: FR-003
